metadata.title: CVE-2018-10850 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: 389-ds-base before versions 1.4.0.10, 1.3.8.3 is vulnerable to a racecondition in the way 389-ds-base handles persistent search, resulting in acrash if the server is under load. An anonymous attacker could use thisflaw to trigger a denial of service.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
